header: Concerning The Collection For Jerusalem: Store Up Your Gift And Be Ready When I Come

verse: Now concerning the collection for the saints, just as I directed in the churches of Galatia, so you do also.
Every first day of the week, let each of you put-aside beside himself, storing-up whatever thing he may be prospered, in-order-that when I come, collections might not be taking place at-that-time.
And when I arrive, whomever you approve, I will send these ones with letters to carry-forth your grace-gift to Jerusalem.
And if it is fitting that I also go, they will go with me.

header: I Will Stay In Ephesus For Now, And Come To You Before Winter

verse: Now I will come to you whenever I go through Macedonia, for I am going through Macedonia.
And perhaps I will continue with you, or even spend-the-winter, in order that you may send me forward wherever I may go.
For I do not want to see you now in passing, for I am hoping to stay with you for some time, if the Lord permits.
But I will stay-on in Ephesus until Pentecost,
for a great and effective door has opened to me, and there are many opposing.

header: Timothy May Come Before Me: Take Care of Him

verse: But if Timothy comes, see that he may come-to-be with you fearlessly. For he is working the work of the Lord as I also.
Therefore let no one treat him with contempt. And send him forward in peace in order that he may come to me, for I am waiting-for him with the brothers.

header: Concerning Apollos: He Will Come When He Can

verse: Now concerning Apollos our brother, I strongly urged him that he come to you with the brothers. And it was not at all his will that he come now, but he will come whenever he finds-an-opportunity.
Keep-watching, be standing-firm in the faith, be acting-like-men, be growing-strong,
let all your things be done in love.
And I exhort you, brothers— you know the household of Stephanas, that it is the firstfruit of Achaia, and they appointed themselves for ministry to the saints—
that you also be subject to such ones, and to everyone helping and laboring.
Now I am rejoicing over the coming of Stephanas and Fortunatus and Achaicus, because these ones filled-up your lack.
For they refreshed my spirit and yours. Therefore be acknowledging such ones.
The churches of Asia greet you. Aquila and Prisca greet you earnestly in the Lord, along with the church at their house.
All the brothers greet you. Greet one another with a holy kiss.
The greeting of Paul by my own hand—
if anyone does not love the Lord, let him be accursed. Marana tha.
The grace of the Lord Jesus be with you.
My love be with you all in Christ Jesus.
